duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop financial models and analysis to drive strategic decision-making and growth objectives.
Lead the strategic planning process and prepare multi-year cash flow forecasts.
Assess business opportunities and risks with a focus on long-term enterprise value creation.
Build detailed financial models for evaluating future investments and portfolio performance.
Lead the FP&A efforts, including long-term strategic planning, annual operating budgets, and forecasting.
Collaborate with IT and Accounting business partners to ensure consistent and reliable financial analysis results.
Manage the real estate financial analysis team for strong underwriting and due diligence.
Provide supervision and guidance in the areas of financial analysis for HREG assets.
Assist in the development of sensitivity models and participate in system upgrades and improvement efforts.
Promote the interests and favorable image of the High Companies.
Perform other duties and assignments as required by Vice President of Finance, President and COO of HREG and CFO of High Companies.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in Accounting or Finance, MBA or CPA preferred
